name: Carmen Ray
comment: It's true. It makes a lot of things quick and easy. And a lot of foods quickly and easily.

name: Dale Owens
comment: I bought the 8 qt Instant Pot Pressure Cooker about month ago. I planned to buy Slow Cooker, but I didn’t find such a big size.

name: Tamara Mitchell
comment: This product is my best friend and I would marry it and grow old with it if I could.

name: Madison Grant
comment: I expected this to last more than a year but less than 3 months I noticed the inner shell paint coating melted and stuck onto the inner stainless steel pot.

comment: I bought the 8 qt Instant Pot Pressure Cooker about month ago. I planned to buy Slow Cooker, but I didn’t find such a big size.
